phrs.translation: 包囊形成, 被囊形成, 包囊现象
密螺旋体包囊形成, 释义密螺旋体包囊形成

sentences.sentence: Methods: the coiled shapes of Trichinella isolated ML were observed under microscopes, then the lengths and widths of ML encystment (encysted index) were measured at random by micrometer.
sentences.translation: 方法：镜下观察旋毛虫幼虫卷曲状态，用测微尺随机测量囊包长、宽。
